mapper.select: select bc.id as COMPANY_ID,bp.id as PERSON_ID,bc.COMPANY_NAME, bc.DESCRIPTION as COMPANY_DESCRIPTION, bp.PERSON_NAME,bp.POSITION_TITLE, bp.DESCRIPTION as PERSON_DESCRIPTION FROM B_PROC_GIVING_GIFTS_PERSION bgp left join B_MD_GIFT_PERSON_INFO bp on bgp.PERSION_ID = bp.ID left join B_MD_GIFT_COMPANY_INFO bc on bc.ID = bp.COMPANY_ID where bp.MARK_DELETED = 'N' and bc.MARK_DELETED = 'N' and bgp.APPLICATION_ID = #{applicationId} and BGP.TYPE = #{type}

SELECT top ${param.topNum} c.ID ,c.COMPANY_NAME ,c.DESCRIPTION FROM B_MD_GIFT_COMPANY_INFO c
AND ( c.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{param.keyword},'%') OR c.DESCRIPTION LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{param.keyword},'%') )
AND c.MARK_DELETED = 'N'
ORDER BY c.COMPANY_NAME ASC, c.DESCRIPTION ASC
